mcq.statement: Which of the following pathways outlines the order of events during aerobic cellular respiration? First — Last

options.a: Glucose — hexose phosphate — pyruvate — Krebs cycle — ethanol + CO₂ + ATP
options.b: Glucose — triose phosphate — pyruvate — Krebs cycle — CO₂ + H₂O + ATP
options.c: Glucose — triose phosphate — pyruvate — Krebs cycle — CO₂ + H₂O + ADP + Pi
